name: TALCHUL
description:
Contributors: Eisaku Imura, Jason Lu, Sabrina Mohler, Raman Nakarmi

Talchul is a top-down stealth game. You play as a refugee trying to evade a labor camp. Along your journey you meet other refugees who increase your ability to see, but also increase the likelihood you'll be detected. You must choose to group with them or not as you wander through fields evading soldiers. How far can you go?
